mapper.sql: SELECT CC.seq AS CCseq ,CCG.seq AS CCGseq ,CCG.groupName AS CCGname ,CCG.groupName_code AS CCGname_code ,CCG.groupName_en AS CCGname_en ,CCG.delYn AS CCGdelYn ,CC.seq AS CCseq ,CC.codeName_code AS CCname_code ,CC.codeName AS CCname ,CC.regdate AS CCregdate ,CC.delYn AS CCdelYn FROM codeGroup CCG LEFT JOIN code CC ON CCG.seq = CC.group_seq
